tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste_tracking (
id INT NOT NULL,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
source_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
unit VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
location VARCHAR(100) NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE households_waste(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quantity_kg DECIMAL,
    address TEXT,
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE businesses_waste(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quantity_kg DECIMAL,
    business_name TEXT,
    collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_waste_kg DECIMAL,
    assessment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE households_waste (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE businesses_waste (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  collector_id INT,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE collection_points (
  point_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  capacity DECIMAL,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)
